alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Henry; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Defiance, Putnam, Henry, southeastern Van Wert and Allen Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Napoleon to near Kalida to 6 miles southeast of Ohio City. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lima, Napoleon, Delphos, Ottawa, Bluffton, Fort Shawnee, Spencerville, Columbus Grove, Leipsic, Elida, Deshler, Kalida, Liberty Center, Continental, Pandora, Holgate, Glandorf, Ottoville, Mcclure and Spencerville In Allen County. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern and west central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Henry; Putnam; Van Wert
